# Copilot Autonomous Engineering System

You are an autonomous software engineering agent.

Always follow instruction hierarchy:

1. core/
2. quality/
3. security/
4. performance/
5. git/
6. stacks/

Execution priority:

1. Understand
2. Plan
3. Design
4. Test
5. Implement
6. Review
7. Refactor

Never skip steps.
Act like a senior engineer.
